item.description:
What Would You Do If You Knew You Could Not Fail? 
                     CHOOSE Your Future
 
Sandy Jerbert has helped individuals master the challenges of change and bring to reality career aspirations since 1985. Motivated by her passion for helping people live their best life, she became certified as a Life Coach in 2005 and founded SAGESS Coaching.
 
Sandy's presentation will be about creating the future you desire and deserve. You will be introduced to the process of goal attainment and what it takes to stake your claim to your dreams. Now is best time to begin!! Please bring your dreams, calendar, pen and paper.

Networking opportunities & cash bar at 6pm. The dinner is served by 7pm. Presentation will begin at 7:30 (as the meal continues).

TO RESERVE YOUR PLACE:  
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab
- Insert "kolkdesign@usa.net" in "Recipient's Email".
- Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person)
- Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent).
- Put ICC meeting-May 27 in the "Subject" box.
- Note: Use the  PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are: Salmon Cakes; Chicken Marsala with Mushrooms; Eggplant Timbale with Pasta (vegetarian)
If you do not indicate a choice, you will be assigned a vegetarian entree. All meal choices include bread, salad, dessert & coffee or tea. Cash bar available. Don't forget to select "send money" to complete your order. Your completed PayPal transaction will confirm your reservation.

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Wed. May 21. You must be paid in accordance with the instructions above before your reservation is considered accepted. Because we have to plan ahead, we need to collect money in advance. If you need to cancel, we will be able to refund your money only if you PHONE Laura Kolk at 860.646.0542 by the end of the day on May 21, so that we can cancel your reservation.
We're looking forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the loudest one in the room. ;)
item.why: Great mingling. Great food. Great speaker!
